synopsis.text: Shin Kazama's bright future comes crashing down when his trusted friend deceives him into joining the deadly Asran Mercenary Air Force. Stationed at the remote airbase Area 88, Shin must confront the grim realities of war on a daily basis, flying perilous combat missions while witnessing the deaths of fellow pilots. Though the chance of serving out his 3-year contract seems slim, Shin is determined to survive and earn his freedom. But even if he manages to return home to his beloved Ryoko, he knows the experience will have irrevocably changed him. Area 88 follows Shin's harrowing journey as he struggles to retain his humanity amidst the brutality of the battlefield and hold onto the hope of one day reclaiming the life that was stolen from him.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
